titleStmt.title: The books opened Being several discourses on Rev. 20. 14. By Henry Pendlebury, A.M. late minister of the Gospel at Rochdale in Lancashire; author of the Plain representation of transubstantiation.
titleStmt.author: Pendlebury, Henry, 1626-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J.D. for Ann Unsworth of Manchester; and sold by Jonathan Robinson at the Golden Lion in St. Paul's Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
